testcase.name: To verify adding multiple options in cart and checkout
testcase.system-out: Given user is on saucedemo homepage.........................................passed And user logged in using correct credential.................................passed And user adds required item to cart.........................................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed And user enters the following details for checkout..........................passed When user confirm checkout..................................................passed Then user verify final confirmation message.................................passed

testcase.name: To verify adding removing then adding and checkout
testcase.system-out: Given user is on saucedemo homepage.........................................passed And user logged in using correct credential.................................passed And user adds one item and then remove that item to go back.................passed And user adds required item to cart.........................................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed And user enters the following details for checkout..........................passed When user confirm checkout..................................................passed Then user verify final confirmation message.................................passed

testcase.name: To verify sort low to high
testcase.system-out: Given user is on saucedemo homepage.........................................passed And user logged in using correct credential.................................passed And user sorts item low to high.............................................passed And user adds required item to cart.........................................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed And user enters the following details for checkout..........................passed When user confirm checkout..................................................passed Then user verify final confirmation message.................................passed
